name: Star Inn Hotel Salzburg Zentrum

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in Star Inn Hotel Zentrum for two nights in May 2008. The hotel was professionally run with staff speaking excellent English.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel was new with very modern decor and had the feel of a business hotel. We booked a standard double room but for some reason it was not available and we were upgraded to an executive room with no extra charge. The room was spotlessly clean, and although it was street-facing, with the double-glazed windows, the street noise was well muffled. Common with most European hotels, there was no tea/coffee making facility in the room, but hot drinks could be purchased at the reception desk/lobby.
reviews.title: very good hotel

description: We have four different room types for you to choose from:48 Standard Rooms 16 m² / 172 ft² in size, furnished with individually controllable thermostats, shower/toilet, and bath with hair dryer, LCD TV with satellite reception, telephone with analog modem, free WLAN access, and a large double bed. Two of these rooms are furnished handicapped accessible. The 17 Business Rooms, at around 20 m² / 215 ft² in size, also feature a comfortable leather sofa. Our 17 Family Rooms are also a good 20 m² / 215 ft² in size and are furnished with two double beds. The 4 suites, each around 50 m² / 538 ft² in size and located on the uppermost floor, furnished with living area, sleeping area, equipped kitchen, and a balcony overlooking the rooftops of the city, guarantee a fantastic stay.
